attributes.action: NHS England should instruct NICE to create a care plan for OCPD.
attributes.additional_details: NICE only provides care pathways for Bi-Polar and Antisocial Personality Disorders.  It's time that NHS England gave equal attention to all personality disorders.
attributes.background: OCPD is one of the most common personality disorders to have so why is there not a clear care pathway for it?

rejection.details:
Commissioning new clinical guidelines to NICE on health-related topics is the responsibility of NHS England. 

You may wish to raise your issue here: https://www.nhs.uk/nhsengland/complaints-and-feedback/pages/nhs-complaints.aspx
